name: RoguelikeRL - Trials of the Forbidden Ice Palace
name_original: RoguelikeRL - Trials of the Forbidden Ice Palace
description:
RoguelikeRL - Where the game learns to play you.

Welcome to RoguelikeRL, a traditional roguelike which uses an Artificial Intelligence model based on Reinforcement Learning (RL) to adapt the difficult to the players playstyle.

Too easy? The AI will kick up the difficulty going forward.

Too hard? You may find more items to aid your future attempts.

Game data synchronizes with other players to create a global AI model.

In-game, press F1 for commands/controls list.
